pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, February 25, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

 9:30 a.m.  The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the third floor foyer of West Block as of 12:00 p.m.

7:00 p.m.  The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at a reception hosted by Minister of Small Business, Export Promotion and International Trade Mary Ng and Minister of Families, Children and Social Development Ahmed Hussen recognizing Canada’s relationships with African countries.

Lester B. Pearson Building
125 Sussex Drive

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 6:30 p.m.
  • Limited parking available. Additional spaces at 111 Sussex
